<Field Type='Choice' DisplayName='Region' StaticName='Region' Name='Region' Required='FALSE' EnforceUniqueValues='FALSE' Indexed='FALSE' Viewable='TRUE' Format='Dropdown' FillInChoice='FALSE'><CHOICES><CHOICE>Africa</CHOICE><CHOICE>Asia</CHOICE><CHOICE>Australia / Pacific</CHOICE><CHOICE>Europe</CHOICE><CHOICE>Middle East</CHOICE><CHOICE>North America / Central America / Caribbean</CHOICE><CHOICE>South America</CHOICE></CHOICES></Field>

<Field Type='MultiChoice' DisplayName='FocusArea' StaticName='FocusArea' Name='FocusArea' Required='FALSE' EnforceUniqueValues='FALSE' Indexed='FALSE' Viewable='TRUE' FillInChoice='FALSE'><CHOICES><CHOICE>Marketing</CHOICE><CHOICE>Teamwork</CHOICE><CHOICE>Business Apps</CHOICE><CHOICE>Virtual Events</CHOICE></CHOICES></Field>

<Field Type='Choice' DisplayName='Group' StaticName='Group' Name='Group' Required='FALSE' EnforceUniqueValues='FALSE' Indexed='FALSE' Viewable='TRUE' Format='Dropdown' FillInChoice='FALSE'><CHOICES><CHOICE>IT Pro</CHOICE><CHOICE>Sales</CHOICE><CHOICE>Engineering</CHOICE></CHOICES></Field>

masterData.Title: Communication in Teams
masterData.Description: Tournament focuses on Microsoft Teams communication capabilities. Get engaged and learn more about communication features around chat, meeting, calling and more to earn points and rewards.

masterData.Title: Collaboration in Teams
masterData.Description: Tournament focuses on Microsoft Teams collaboration capabilities. Get engaged and learn more about collaboration features around channels, posts, files and more to earn points and rewards.

masterData.Title: Apps in Teams
masterData.Description: Tournament focuses on Microsoft Teams applications capabilities. Get engaged and learn more about applications features within team channels and groups to earn points and rewards.
